mapper.insert: insert into author(member_no, author, sns_link, author_thumbnail, debut_year, author_msg) values(#{member_no}, #{author}, #{sns_link}, #{author_thumbnail}, #{debut_year}, #{author_msg})
mapper.select: select no, member_no, author, sns_link, author_thumbnail, debut_year, create_date, author_msg, author_status from author
select author from author where author=#{author}
